title: Monte Cassino and revolutionary Russia
itunes:title: Monte Cassino and revolutionary Russia
itunes:subtitle: On the 70th anniversary of the Battle of Monte Cassino, Matthew Parker explores one of the Allies' toughest challenges in the Second World War. Meanwhile we speak to Professor Orlando Figes, author of a new book and website about Russia's revol...
description:
On the 70th anniversary of the Battle of Monte Cassino, Matthew Parker explores one of the Allies' toughest challenges in the Second World War. Meanwhile we speak to Professor Orlando Figes, author of a new book and website about Russia's revolutionary period.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
